1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Go Eun Sung returns from her studies abroad as she is called upon by her father. Sun-Woo Hwan who was summoned by her grandmother for getting into trouble is also aboard on the same flight. As Woo Hwan gets up and reaches for his bag, he unknowingly takes the wrong bag. Eun Sung, who had just awoke hurries and grabs the bag that looks like hers but actually belongs to Woo Hwan.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Eun Sung can't believe that her father is dead. She keeps telling her mother that it might not be him until her mother shows her the ID card and ring that belonged to her father. Meanwhile, Woo Hwan who has been waiting for Eun Sung to arrive gets caught by his grandmother. He is dragged to the house where her grandmother declares that he should quit his studies abroad and come back home.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Eun Sung receives a shocking call that her brother Eun Woo has disappeared. Eun Sung dashes to the house and searches the neighborhood and other places Eun Woo might be in. Meanwhile, Eun Sung's mother drives Eun Woo far away from Seoul, and drops him off. She makes him promise not to ever call his sister or he'll never be able to see her again.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: As Eun Sung tells the old lady that she has to leave to look for her brother, the old lady clings on to her. Eun Sung recalls her asking for forgiveness as she is an old lady without any family and has to make a living by herself. Eun Sung takes the old lady in. Meanwhile, back at home, Hwan is demanding to be flown back to the States and goes to the airport himself.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Eun Sung arrives at the house of the old lady. The old lady offers Eun Sung breakfast and Eun Sung questions her why her family doesn't know about her accident and why with all the wealth, she went to the market, but the old lady tells her that it's a secret. Over breakfast, the old lady proposes for her and Eun Sung to live together.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Go Pyung Joon appears in front of Baek Sung Hee. Baek Sung Hee who firmly believed that he was dead, is both frightened and shocked. Eun Sung and Hye Ri discuss about Eun Sung's previous encounter with her stepmother. Hye Ri is dissatisfied that Eun Sung's stepmother asked Eun Sung to keep it a secret that they are a family. Hye Ri suspects that there is something behind all this.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Chairman Jang declares to her family that she will stop her financial support for them. On top of that, she announces that she will leave all her possessions to Go Eun Sung. The family is in shock. They can't believe she will leave all her inheritance to a girl she has only met. Chairman Jang apologizes to have raised them to become so helpless and live a meaningless life.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Eun Sung warns Hwan that she won't be lending him any more money. Hwan, believing that she is scolding him because she knows that she will inherit Chairman Jang's possessions advises her not to fool around because she won't be receiving the inheritance in the end. Eun Sung is taken aback by Hwan's words.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: Eun Sung talks to her stepmother about Chairman Jang's help in searching for her brother. She tells her stepmother that she believes Eun Woo is not in Seoul anymore but down in the countryside. Her stepmother advises her to refuse the Chairman's aids or else she would be in an uncomfortable situation later on. However Eun Sung states that she can go through anything to find Eun Woo.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Since Eun Sung's friend Hye Ri invites her to dinner, Sook Ja dolls her up for the special occasion.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: Eun Sung is transferred to the company factory while Sung Hee and Seung Mi tell Pyung Joong that Eun Sung and Eun Woo are in America.

12.title: Episode #1.12
12.plot: Eun Sung is still grieving over Eun Woo's second disappearance and confronts Sung Hee and Hwan. Young Suk stumbles upon Eun Woo and dubs him the autistic piano boy.

13.title: Episode #1.13
13.plot: Sook Ja surprises everyone with her new will that says only Eun Sung will inherit the company and her wealth. Her family and employees lash out angrily in response.

14.title: Episode #1.14
14.plot: Hwan sets out to prove his grandmother wrong by working in another of his grandmother's restaurants. With Young Ran and Jung staying over in protest to Sook Ja's will, Sung Hee tries to hide any trace of being related to Eun Sung and Eun Woo.

15.title: Episode #1.15
15.plot: Hwan finds a family picture with both Eun Sung and Seung Mi in it. While Jun Se starts developing deeper feelings for Eun Sung, Hwan meets Eun Woo for the first time.

16.title: Episode #1.16
16.plot: Drama ensues because Jun Se doesn't like Jung back. While Hwan and Eun Sung work hard at promoting the 30th anniversary of the restaurant, Hwan starts to like Eun Sung.

17.title: Episode #1.17
17.plot: Seung Mi finds out that Hwan likes Eun Sung. Sung Hee sends Pyung Joong out into the countryside to avoid any chance of Eun Sung and him meeting.

18.title: Episode #1.18
18.plot: After catching a glimpse of Eun Sung, Pyung Joong resumes his search for his children. Eun Sung and Hwan continue to try and raise the sales of the restaurant.

19.title: Episode #1.19
19.plot: Eun Sung discovers that Sung Hee took all of the insurance money that was left to her and Eun Woo. Sung Hee reveals to Young Ran Eun Sung's identity in an attempt to kick her out of Hwan's house.

20.title: Episode #1.20
20.plot: Sook Ja kicks Eun Sung out of her house under the impression that Eun Sung is a fraud, so Eun Sung tries to find a way to prove her innocence.

21.title: Episode #1.21
21.plot: Things get awkward when a drunk Hwan passes out in Eun Sung's apartment. Later, Hwan and Eun Sung take a business trip together on a cruise to bid for a morning menu.

22.title: Episode #1.22
22.plot: Seung Mi must deal with the fact that Hwan has feelings for Eun Sung. Hwan's outlook towards his work changes when he makes a fateful delivery to a customer.

23.title: Episode #1.23
23.plot: With Sook Ja in the hospital, Eun Sung is prohibited from visiting. She only has the support of Hwan and Jun Se as she grieves over Sook Ja's condition.

24.title: Episode #1.24
24.plot: Hwan confronts Seung Mi about the lies she's told him regarding Eun Sung. Because of her weak condition, plans are made to dismiss Sook Ja as president of the company.

25.title: Episode #1.25
25.plot: With Hwan and Eun Sung's efforts, Sook Ja remains the president of the company. While the employees are ecstatic, Jun Se's father and Sung Hee are not.

26.title: Episode #1.26
26.plot: Seung Mi discovers what Sung Hee did to Eun Woo. Sung Hee forces Eun Sung to leave the country in order to see her brother Eun Woo again.

27.title: Episode #1.27
27.plot: Right as Eun Sung is about to board the plane, she is accidentally reunited with Pyung Joong. Together with Hwan and Jun Se, they figure out Sung Hee's plot and find Eun Woo.

28.title: Episode #1.28
28.plot: Sung Hee returns the insurance money from Pyung Joong's death. Sook Ja leaves the company to the employees as Eun Sung leaves to study abroad in the States.

imdb.plot outline: Tragedy strikes Eun-seong (Han Hyo-Joo) when her father suddenly dies and her brother goes missing. Then, by accident, good fortune arrives on Eun-seong's doorsteps when her kindness to an old woman yields the promise she'll inherits a vast fortune. Woo-han Seon (Lee Seung-Ki) is an arrogant young heir to this vast fortune. He has no idea about the value of money as he was spoiled by his wealthy grandmother and mother. One day, Woo-han's grandmother (Ban Hyo-Jung) delivers a wake-up call, she will give all of her fortune to Eun-seong.
imdb.title: Shining Inheritance
plot: Tragedy strikes Eun-seong (Han Hyo-Joo) when her father suddenly dies and her brother goes missing. Then, by accident, good fortune arrives on Eun-seong's doorsteps when her kindness to an old woman yields the promise she'll inherits a vast fortune. Woo-han Seon (Lee Seung-Ki) is an arrogant young heir to this vast fortune. He has no idea about the value of money as he was spoiled by his wealthy grandmother and mother. One day, Woo-han's grandmother (Ban Hyo-Jung) delivers a wake-up call, she will give all of her fortune to Eun-seong.::asianwiki
